entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 28 February 2023
